page.title: 17A Day in My Life: Robert.
page.content: My name is Robert Williams.I am 13,and I live at Stockend Farm with my father,mother and 3 sisters (17,16,2). I get up at 7am,and before breakfast I help Dad to get the cows in,and fill buckets of water to wash them before milking.At 8am,I walk to the road to catch the school bus.School lasts from 8.55am _ 3.30pm,and then I catch the bus home again. When I get home,I feed our 5 dogs, 12 cats and rabbit,and I walk the cows up the field.After tea I help with the milking. At about 7pm I do some school work,and then I watch TV until I go to bed at 9.00pm. At the weekend,I go fishing,or beat for shooting,or ride my bike to my Gran's,or on Sunday we may go out, because someone comes in to do the milking:I always help on the farm, and the work depends on the season.
